20101229030044.000|20101229030046.000|CC1|THAT HAS SIMILAR EYES.

20101229030048.000|20101229030050.000|CC1|ANOTHER INMATE A CHANCE TO GO   
20101229030050.000|20101229030050.000|CC1|HOME.

20101229030051.000|20101229030055.000|CC1|FOR SOMETHING I DIDN'T DO.      
20101229030055.000|20101229030056.000|CC1|>> STILL IN QUESTION.           
20101229030056.000|20101229030058.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE REFUSING TO GRANT MY 
20101229030058.000|20101229030059.000|CC1|EARNED TIME.                    
20101229030059.000|20101229030101.000|CC1|>> MEANWHILE, A VERY DIFFERENT  
20101229030101.000|20101229030102.000|CC1|DRAMA UNFOLDS AS A FATHER AND   
20101229030102.000|20101229030106.000|CC1|SON TRY TO RECONCILE A VIOLENT  
20101229030106.000|20101229030106.000|CC1|PAST.                           
20101229030106.000|20101229030108.000|CC1|>> MY DAD TRIED EVERYTHING TO   
20101229030108.000|20101229030108.000|CC1|PUNISH ME.                      
20101229030108.000|20101229030111.000|CC1|THE SLAPS AND KICKS TURNED INTO 
20101229030111.000|20101229030113.000|CC1|PUNCHES AND HEAD BUTTS, BROKEN  
20101229030113.000|20101229030113.000|CC1|NOSE.                           
20101229030113.000|20101229030115.000|CC1|>> THERE'S NO DOUBT ABOUT IT.   
20101229030115.000|20101229030147.000|CC1|HE WAS ABUSED AT MY HANDS.      
20101229030147.000|20101229030202.000|CC1|??                              
20101229030202.000|20101229030204.000|CC1|? OH YOU KNOW WHAT I FEEL IS    
20101229030204.000|20101229030208.000|CC1|REAL ?                          
20101229030208.000|20101229030209.000|CC1|>> ONE REALITY OF PRISON IS THAT
20101229030209.000|20101229030211.000|CC1|THERE'S NEVER A SHORTAGE OF     
20101229030211.000|20101229030212.000|CC1|PAIN.                           
20101229030212.000|20101229030214.000|CC1|>> DADDY.                       
20101229030214.000|20101229030220.000|CC1|>> AND AT THE LIMON CORRECTIONAL
20101229030220.000|20101229030221.000|CC1|FACILITY IN COLORADO THERE'S    
20101229030221.000|20101229030223.000|CC1|ENOUGH LEFT OVER FOR THE        
20101229030223.000|20101229030223.000|CC1|VISITORS AS WELL.               
20101229030223.000|20101229030226.000|CC1|>> AT FIRST, A LITTLE NERVOUS   
20101229030226.000|20101229030229.000|CC1|ABOUT COMING HERE.              
20101229030229.000|20101229030233.000|CC1|BUT IF YOU COME ONCE A MONTH FOR
20101229030233.000|20101229030237.000|CC1|SEVERAL YEARS, IT KIND OF       
20101229030237.000|20101229030238.000|CC1|BECOMES ROUTINE.                
20101229030238.000|20101229030241.000|CC1|THIS IS THE WAY I SEE IT.       
20101229030241.000|20101229030243.000|CC1|>> I'VE BEEN LOCKED UP FOR FIVE 
20101229030243.000|20101229030243.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20101229030243.000|20101229030246.000|CC1|AND I WAS CHARGED WITH CHILD    
20101229030246.000|20101229030251.000|CC1|ABUSE RESULTING IN DEATH.       
20101229030251.000|20101229030253.000|CC1|>> AT THE TIME I WORKED FOR THE 
20101229030253.000|20101229030255.000|CC1|"DENVER POST," THE WAY I FOUND  
20101229030255.000|20101229030258.000|CC1|OUT SOMETHING HAD HAPPENED, WAS 
20101229030258.000|20101229030259.000|CC1|MY WIFE CALLED ME AND TOLD ME   
20101229030259.000|20101229030300.000|CC1|THAT POLICE WERE LOOKING FOR    
20101229030300.000|20101229030301.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20101229030301.000|20101229030302.000|CC1|SHE KIND OF GAVE ME A HEADS UP  
20101229030302.000|20101229030303.000|CC1|ABOUT IT.                       
20101229030303.000|20101229030304.000|CC1|I STILL WASN'T SURE ABOUT WHAT  
20101229030304.000|20101229030305.000|CC1|WAS GOING ON.                   
20101229030305.000|20101229030306.000|CC1|IT WASN'T UNTIL THAT NIGHT WHEN 
20101229030306.000|20101229030311.000|CC1|I WENT TO WORK THAT THEY PRINTED
20101229030311.000|20101229030314.000|CC1|THE STORY, AND I FOUND OUT.     
20101229030314.000|20101229030317.000|CC1|>> MY GIRL AT THE TIME, SHE HAD 
20101229030317.000|20101229030319.000|CC1|A SON, AND HE JUST STARTED, YOU 
20101229030319.000|20101229030322.000|CC1|KNOW, HIS CRYING, YOU KNOW WHAT 
20101229030322.000|20101229030323.000|CC1|I MEAN?                         
20101229030323.000|20101229030325.000|CC1|AND LIKE UNCONTROLLABLY.        
20101229030325.000|20101229030327.000|CC1|AND SEEMED LIKE NO MATTER WHAT I
20101229030327.000|20101229030329.000|CC1|DID OR ATTEMPTED TO DO, HE      
20101229030329.000|20101229030331.000|CC1|WOULDN'T STOP CRYING.           
20101229030331.000|20101229030332.000|CC1|>> HOW OLD WAS THE BABY?        
20101229030332.000|20101229030336.000|CC1|>> HE WAS MAYBE LIKE SEVEN,     
20101229030336.000|20101229030339.000|CC1|EIGHT MONTHS MAYBE.             
20101229030339.000|20101229030346.000|CC1|>> KRISTOPHER PARDUE ADMITTED HE
20101229030346.000|20101229030348.000|CC1|HIT THE BABY UNTIL IT WENT LIMP.
20101229030348.000|20101229030351.000|CC1|>> I READ ARTICLES IN THE PAPER 
20101229030351.000|20101229030352.000|CC1|LIKE THIS BEFORE.               
20101229030352.000|20101229030354.000|CC1|WHEN IT'S OTHER PEOPLE, I WANTED
20101229030354.000|20101229030356.000|CC1|TO JUST GO AHEAD AND PUT THEM   
20101229030356.000|20101229030357.000|CC1|UNDER THE PERSON.               
20101229030357.000|20101229030358.000|CC1|BUT IT'S MY SON.                
20101229030358.000|20101229030400.000|CC1|HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO LOOK AT    
20101229030400.000|20101229030400.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20101229030400.000|20101229030403.000|CC1|AM I SUPPOSED TO FEEL THE SAME  
20101229030403.000|20101229030403.000|CC1|WAY?                            
20101229030403.000|20101229030405.000|CC1|YES, BUT HE'S MY SON.           
20101229030405.000|20101229030407.000|CC1|SO NO, I'M NOT SUPPOSED TO FEEL 
20101229030407.000|20101229030411.000|CC1|THE SAME WAY.                   
20101229030411.000|20101229030416.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN A LONG ROAD AND I     
20101229030416.000|20101229030418.000|CC1|CAN'T TURN MY BACK ON HIM.      
20101229030418.000|20101229030423.000|CC1|HE'S MINE.                      
20101229030423.000|20101229030427.000|CC1|>> WHILE KRISTOPHER WASN'T CLOSE
20101229030427.000|20101229030431.000|CC1|WITH HIS FATHER GROWING UP,     
20101229030431.000|20101229030432.000|CC1|ABUSE WASN'T PART OF THEM       
20101229030432.000|20101229030433.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20101229030433.000|20101229030436.000|CC1|BUT THE TENTACLES STRETCH OUT TO
20101229030436.000|20101229030436.000|CC1|LIMON.                          
20101229030436.000|20101229030438.000|CC1|HOME TO ABUSERS AND THE ABUSED. 
20101229030438.000|20101229030440.000|CC1|>> I DON'T FEEL PHYSICAL PAIN.  
20101229030440.000|20101229030443.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T REGISTER TO ME.      
20101229030443.000|20101229030445.000|CC1|WHEN SOMEBODY HITS ME I BECOME  
20101229030445.000|20101229030446.000|CC1|INFURIATED AND ALL I WANT TO DO 
20101229030446.000|20101229030450.000|CC1|IS RIP THEIR [ BLEEP ] THROAT   
20101229030450.000|20101229030457.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20101229030457.000|20101229030500.000|CC1|I WENT THROUGH SOME PRETTY BAT  
20101229030500.000|20101229030501.000|CC1|ABUSE AS A KID.                 
20101229030501.000|20101229030503.000|CC1|MY DAD TRIED EVERYTHING TO      
20101229030503.000|20101229030504.000|CC1|PUNISH ME.                      
20101229030504.000|20101229030506.000|CC1|THE SLAPS AND KICKS TURNED INTO 
20101229030506.000|20101229030508.000|CC1|PUNCHES AND HEAD BUTTS, BROKEN  
20101229030508.000|20101229030509.000|CC1|NOSE, CIGARETTES BEING PUT OUT  
20101229030509.000|20101229030510.000|CC1|ON ME.                          
20101229030510.000|20101229030513.000|CC1|FROM THE AGE OF 7 TO 11, I      
20101229030513.000|20101229030514.000|CC1|PROBABLY FELT EVERY PIECE OF    
20101229030514.000|20101229030515.000|CC1|PHYSICAL ABUSE A KID COULD      
20101229030515.000|20101229030516.000|CC1|PROBABLY FEEL.                  
20101229030516.000|20101229030517.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY I DIDN'T FEEL THE    
20101229030517.000|20101229030518.000|CC1|PAIN.                           
20101229030518.000|20101229030519.000|CC1|YOU GO NUMB AFTER A WHILE.      
20101229030519.000|20101229030521.000|CC1|A PERSON CAN ONLY TAKE SO MUCH  
20101229030521.000|20101229030522.000|CC1|OF THAT BEFORE THEIR BODY       
20101229030522.000|20101229030524.000|CC1|BECOMES TOLERANT TO IT.         
20101229030524.000|20101229030526.000|CC1|I BUILT A TOLERANCE FOR PAIN,   
20101229030526.000|20101229030530.000|CC1|WHICH IS WHY THEY CALL ME PURE  
20101229030530.000|20101229030530.000|CC1|PAIN.                           
20101229030530.000|20101229030533.000|CC1|>> ONE INCIDENT FROM LASHBROOK'S
20101229030533.000|20101229030536.000|CC1|CHILDHOOD STILL LIES VERY CLOSE 
20101229030536.000|20101229030537.000|CC1|TO THE SURFACE.                 
20101229030537.000|20101229030539.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED WHEN HE WAS 14 AND  
20101229030539.000|20101229030540.000|CC1|HAD SNUCK OUT OF THE HOUSE.     
20101229030540.000|20101229030542.000|CC1|>> I SNUCK BACK IN THINKING THAT
20101229030542.000|20101229030545.000|CC1|I GOT CLEAN AWAY WITH IT BUT I  
20101229030545.000|20101229030545.000|CC1|DIDN'T.                         
20101229030545.000|20101229030547.000|CC1|MY DAD WOKE ME UP BY YANKING ME 
20101229030547.000|20101229030555.000|CC1|OUT OF MY BED BY MY FEET.       
20101229030555.000|20101229030559.000|CC1|HE PULLED ME OUT OF MY BED BY MY
20101229030559.000|20101229030605.000|CC1|FEET AND DRUG ME INTO THE LIVING
20101229030605.000|20101229030617.000|CC1|ROOM AND -- TIME OUT.           
20101229030617.000|20101229030620.000|CC1|>> MOMENTS LATER, LASHBROOK     
20101229030620.000|20101229030621.000|CC1|COMPOSED HIMSELF AND CONTINUED  
20101229030621.000|20101229030622.000|CC1|HIS STORY.                      
20101229030622.000|20101229030624.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS NO QUESTIONS.      
20101229030624.000|20101229030626.000|CC1|JUST HE STARTED SCREAMING AT ME 
20101229030626.000|20101229030629.000|CC1|AND SAID HE WAS SICK AND        
20101229030629.000|20101229030630.000|CC1|[ BLEEP ] OF ME AND TIRED OF THE
20101229030630.000|20101229030632.000|CC1|[ BLEEP ] THAT I WAS DOING AND  
20101229030632.000|20101229030635.000|CC1|THE FISTS STARTED COMING AND THE
20101229030635.000|20101229030636.000|CC1|BOOTS.                          
20101229030636.000|20101229030638.000|CC1|GRABBED ME OFF THE DOOR BY MY   
20101229030638.000|20101229030641.000|CC1|HAIR, YANKED ME BY MY HAIR,     
20101229030641.000|20101229030642.000|CC1|FLUNG ME INTO THE DINING HALL   
20101229030642.000|20101229030643.000|CC1|AND STARTED TO BEAT THE         
20101229030643.000|20101229030646.000|CC1|[ BLEEP ] OUT OF ME.            
20101229030646.000|20101229030647.000|CC1|>> LASHBROOK'S TROUBLED         
20101229030647.000|20101229030650.000|CC1|CHILDHOOD HAS FOLLOWED HIM TO   
20101229030650.000|20101229030650.000|CC1|PRISON.                         
20101229030650.000|20101229030653.000|CC1|HE'S HAD DOZENS OF DISCIPLINARY 
20101229030653.000|20101229030654.000|CC1|WRITEUPS FOR EVERYTHING FROM    
20101229030654.000|20101229030655.000|CC1|DESTROYING PROPERTY TO MAKING   
20101229030655.000|20101229030657.000|CC1|THREATS AND TATTOOING.          
20101229030657.000|20101229030700.000|CC1|>> WHERE A LOT OF DRAMA POPS    
20101229030700.000|20101229030700.000|CC1|OFF.                            
20101229030700.000|20101229030702.000|CC1|TO AVOID AN ISSUE OR ME GETTING 
20101229030702.000|20101229030704.000|CC1|KUFD UP AND TAKEN TO SEGREGATION
20101229030704.000|20101229030707.000|CC1|OR CAUSING A SECURITY ISSUE AND 
20101229030707.000|20101229030709.000|CC1|EVERYBODY GETTING LOCKED DOWN   
20101229030709.000|20101229030710.000|CC1|AND ME CATCHING A WRITEUP OVER  
20101229030710.000|20101229030713.000|CC1|IT, I CHOOSE TO STAY IN MY CELL 
20101229030713.000|20101229030714.000|CC1|AND EAT MYSELF.                 
20101229030714.000|20101229030716.000|CC1|TAKE ONE WHOLE SAUSAGE.         
20101229030716.000|20101229030718.000|CC1|YOU SLICE IT UP LIKE HE HAS     
20101229030718.000|20101229030719.000|CC1|LONGWAYS.                       
20101229030719.000|20101229030720.000|CC1|YOU MAKE QUARTERS OUT OF THEM,  
20101229030720.000|20101229030722.000|CC1|THEN CUT THAT COMPLETELY IN     
20101229030722.000|20101229030722.000|CC1|HALF.                           
20101229030722.000|20101229030723.000|CC1|THEN SOMETIMES I'LL PUT A LITTLE
20101229030723.000|20101229030725.000|CC1|BIT OF HONEY ON TOP OF THE      
20101229030725.000|20101229030726.000|CC1|SAUSAGE, THEN I'LL PUT THE      
20101229030726.000|20101229030728.000|CC1|CHEESE ON THE TOP OF IT AND THEN
20101229030728.000|20101229030730.000|CC1|COOK IT IN THE MICROWAVE FOR A  
20101229030730.000|20101229030733.000|CC1|MINUTE.                         
20101229030733.000|20101229030736.000|CC1|SO IT FE MELTS IT DOWN AND MAKE 
20101229030736.000|20101229030736.000|CC1|PRETTY GOOD MEAL.               
20101229030736.000|20101229030737.000|CC1|BETTER THAN THE FOOD THEY SERVE 
20101229030737.000|20101229030738.000|CC1|YOU IN THE CHOW HALL.           
20101229030738.000|20101229030740.000|CC1|>> COOKING IN HIS CELL IS JUST  
20101229030740.000|20101229030743.000|CC1|ONE WAY THAT LASHBROOK COMBATS  
20101229030743.000|20101229030745.000|CC1|THE PAIN OF PRISON LIFE.        
20101229030745.000|20101229030746.000|CC1|OTHERS SEEK WAYS TO EXPRESS     
20101229030746.000|20101229030749.000|CC1|THEIR INDIVIDUALITY.            
20101229030749.000|20101229030751.000|CC1|BUT DAVID TOOK THINGS TO A LEVEL
20101229030751.000|20101229030753.000|CC1|UNLIKE ANYTHING EVER WITNESSED  
20101229030753.000|20101229030755.000|CC1|BY LOCKUP PRODUCERS.            
20101229030755.000|20101229030757.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE TATTOOED RED, THE    
20101229030757.000|20101229030758.000|CC1|WHITES OF MY EYES.              
20101229030758.000|20101229030759.000|CC1|>> WHY?                         
20101229030759.000|20101229030801.000|CC1|>> I DON'T KNOW.                
20101229030801.000|20101229030803.000|CC1|PEOPLE ASK WHY, THE GOOD        
20101229030803.000|20101229030814.000|CC1|QUESTION IS WHY NOT?            
20101229030814.000|20101229030816.000|CC1|>> EVERYBODY'S GOT TATOOS,      
20101229030816.000|20101229030818.000|CC1|STRETCHED EARS AND THIS AND     
20101229030818.000|20101229030819.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101229030819.000|20101229030820.000|CC1|YOU NEVER SEE ANYBODY WITH THE  
20101229030820.000|20101229030824.000|CC1|WHITES OF THEIR EYES TA TOOED.  
20101229030824.000|20101229030826.000|CC1|>> EXCEPT FOR HIS CELLMATE PAUL.
20101229030826.000|20101229030828.000|CC1|>> LIKE THE FINAL FRONTIER.     
20101229030828.000|20101229030830.000|CC1|NOBODY'S GOT IT DONE.           
20101229030830.000|20101229030833.000|CC1|I HAVE BLUE EYES SO I CHOSE     
20101229030833.000|20101229030833.000|CC1|BLUE.                           
20101229030833.000|20101229030835.000|CC1|I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE A GOOD    
20101229030835.000|20101229030836.000|CC1|COMBINATION BETWEEN A DARK BLUE 
20101229030836.000|20101229030837.000|CC1|AND BLACK.                      
20101229030837.000|20101229030838.000|CC1|I THOUGHT BLACK WOULD BE A      
20101229030838.000|20101229030838.000|CC1|LITTLE SCARY.                   
20101229030838.000|20101229030851.000|CC1|SO I WENT WITH DARK BLUE.       
20101229030851.000|20101229030853.000|CC1|INSTEAD OF BEING ONE IN BILLIONS
20101229030853.000|20101229030857.000|CC1|OF PEOPLE IN THE WORLD, YOU CAN 
20101229030857.000|20101229030858.000|CC1|BE LIKE THE FIFTH OR SIXTH      
20101229030858.000|20101229030900.000|CC1|PERSON IN THE WORLD TO BE LIKE  
20101229030900.000|20101229030900.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101229030900.000|20101229030902.000|CC1|THAT'S PRETTY AMAZING.          
20101229030902.000|20101229030904.000|CC1|I'LL BET YOU THERE'S NO ONE IN  
20101229030904.000|20101229030906.000|CC1|THE WORLD THAT HAS THE SAME     
20101229030906.000|20101229030907.000|CC1|COLOR EYES AS I DO.             
20101229030907.000|20101229030908.000|CC1|>> NEITHER OF THE CELLMATES     
20101229030908.000|20101229030910.000|CC1|WOULD REVEAL HOW THEY TATTOO    
20101229030910.000|20101229030912.000|CC1|THEIR EYES OR HOW THEY MANAGED  
20101229030912.000|20101229030914.000|CC1|TO CREATE THE COLORED INK.      
20101229030914.000|20101229030916.000|CC1|>> I DO KNOW THAT IT IS PAINFUL 
20101229030916.000|20101229030919.000|CC1|AND YOU DON'T USE CONVENTIONAL  
20101229030919.000|20101229030922.000|CC1|TATTOOS OR HOMEMADE TATTOO GUN. 
20101229030922.000|20101229030924.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO GET IN BETWEEN THAT 
20101229030924.000|20101229030924.000|CC1|LAYER.                          
20101229030924.000|20101229030931.000|CC1|YOU CAN USE A HYPO DETERMINIC   
20101229030931.000|20101229030932.000|CC1|NEEDLE BUT I AIN'T SAYING THAT'S
20101229030932.000|20101229030933.000|CC1|WHAT WE USED.                   
20101229030933.000|20101229030938.000|CC1|>> WE CALL MY CELLY HAMSTER BUT 
20101229030938.000|20101229030939.000|CC1|HE'S MORE LIKE A GUINEA PIG.    
20101229030939.000|20101229030941.000|CC1|YOU CAN TAKE IT ANY WAY YOU     
20101229030941.000|20101229030942.000|CC1|WANT.
